targets.query: SELECT count("value") FROM "java.lang_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^web\-server\-/ AND time > now() - 30s GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("value") FROM "java.lang_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^business\-server\-/ AND time > now() - 30s GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE host =~ /^$host/ AND path =~ /^C/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE host =~ /^$host/ AND path =~ /^D/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE host =~ /^$host/ AND path =~ /^\// AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
